name: phpxmlrpc/jsonrpc
description: A php library for building jsonrpc clients and servers

suggest.ext-curl: Needed for HTTPS and HTTP 1.1 support, NTLM Auth etc...
suggest.ext-zlib: Needed for sending compressed requests and receiving compressed responses, if cURL is not available
suggest.ext-mbstring: Needed to allow reception of requests/responses in character sets other than ASCII,LATIN-1,UTF-8
suggest.sami/sami: Required for doc generation using pake. Version constraints: ^3.3 || ^4.1
